data.name: One line task: Find length of Chord of Circle
data.description:
### Task

Given a Circle with 3 chords like this:
![Circle](data:image/png;base64,)

Write a single line function `chord_length(a, b, t)` which returns the value of `x` provided the values of `a`, `b` and `t` where `t` is equal to `Î¸`.

### Note

```
Character Limit: 72
Value of `t` will be in degree. Also 0 <= t < 90.
Values of `a`, `b` and 't' will be floats always.
The returned value needs to be approximately equal to the true solution(tolerance 1e-09)
```


Question Source: r/HomeworkHelp
